casebody.data:
STATE v. Rayford Lewis BURKE 181A93-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 9, 2016 Franklin E. Wells, Jr., Attorney at Law, Asheboro, Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Malcolm Ray Hunter, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Burke, Rayford Lewis. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mikko Red Arrow, Assistant District Attorney, Jonathan Babb, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Sarah Kirkman, District Attorney, for State of N.C. Christopher A. Brook, Legal Director, Burton Craige, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, James Coleman, Attorney at Law, Irving Joyner, Attorney at Law, Durham, Cassandra Stubbs, Attorney at Law, for ACLU Capital Punishment Project, et al.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion to amend Petitioner-Appellant's brief filed on the 8th of September 2016 by Petitioner: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of September 2016." Ervin, J., recused.
